item.title: About the website
item.description: Hi all, This website is created in order to provide support for some R packages, related to forecasting. It is maintained by Ivan Svetunkov.

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Hello world! Hi everybody! Welcome to the new website dedicated to forecasting with R. This is a mixture of blog and textbooks. The textbook that we currently have on the website is ADAM. This is an ongoing project. We also have a page with CMAF webinars.
